::: {.column width="50%"}
<div class = "body-text">Run selected cell: `control` (or `command`) + `return`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Run selected cell & move to next cell: `shift` + `return`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Change cell type to *Markdown*: `M`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Change cell type to *Code*: `Y`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Change from edit to command mode (green border): `esc`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Change from command to edit mode (blue border): `esc`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Delete cell: `DD` (command mode)
<div class = "body-text">Select all: `command` + `A`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Open command palette: `command` + `shift` + `P`</div>
<div class = "body-text">Move cursor one word to right or left: `option` + right/left arrow</div>
:::
